item.title: Investors
item.description: Organization/Person Name Number of Investments Number of Exits Location Twitter Facebook LinkedIn Primary Job Title Primary Organization Investor Type Investment Stage CB Rank (Investor) Full Description Aaron Greenspan Toronto, Ontario, Canada Twitter Facebook LinkedIn Founder, Owner LEWYS LENS MEDIA 76,247 AARON 'Lewy' GREENSPAN is a nationally-published commercial, press and lifestyle photographer, marketer, producer and digital strategist with over five years of unique creative experience working in the Canadian entertainment, business, news, and digital media/advertising industries.

item.title: Entrepreneurs
item.description: Full Name Primary Job Title Location Twitter LinkedIn Facebook Schools Attended Biography Aadil Bandukwala Senior Director Of Marketing Bangalore, Karnataka, India Twitter LinkedIn Facebook Aadil is a B2B Marketing Leader with a proven track record of driving measurable growth YoY. He currently is Director Marketing APAC for HackerRank. Previously Aadil was at LinkedIn consulting CHROs on their people strategy. Aadil has also worked at Dell building their social media talent acquisition and employer brand strategy and has extensively evangelised Belong - a Sequoia Capital backed startup across APAC.

item.title: About
item.description: The xamazonian.org community was formed to bring together Amazon alumni and current Amazonians interested in helping ex-Amazon entrepreneurs. Please join us to access our global community of members and events to help your startup succeed. Some of our events include regular meetups about startup growth tactics and brainstorming sessions with founders to address their specific challenges. We also have an active slack group where ex-Amazonians can help each other. xamazonian.org is not an Amazon affiliate.
